task_description: Voice Profile & Personalization - Enable AI content suggestions to match individual user writing styles and brand voices

patterns.tinybase_pattern: Use store.setRow(table, id, data) for writes, useCell/useSetCellCallback for React integration, auto-persistence already configured
patterns.ai_api_pattern: Client calls localhost:3001/api/* endpoints, server uses OpenAI SDK with ZAI base URL, use system role messages for voice persona
patterns.component_pattern: Card-based UI with loading/error states, TinyBase hooks for state management, Radix UI primitives for controls
patterns.voice_prompt_strategy: Use system message for voice persona, include few-shot examples as message pairs, temperature 0.8 for natural variation

existing_implementations.description: TinyBase store with settings, currentTweet, and tweetLog tables. AI hook generation via /api/generate-hooks endpoint. Auto-persistence to localStorage already configured.
